page.title: 15THE TERRACE GARDENS
page.content: The Terrace Gardens is one of the loveliest places in Surrey. Before the Terrace Gardens were built there was a large building on that site. The building was called Lansdowne House. It was knocked down and they built the Terrace Gardens there in 1880. The Terrace Gardens are large Victorian gardens. There is a cafe there where you can have a small snack. There are passages leading to different parts of the garden. When you go to the Gardens there is a pond and on one side of the walls there are archways. In the Autumn the leaves on the trees are beautiful and their many colours attract many visitors. I like to roll down the hill at the Terrace Gardens or look from the top of the hill down to the River Thames. People picnic in the sunshine on the hillside. They feed the squirrels from their hands.
